name: SANIC the Hedghog - Free Game!
description:
This is the game everyone has been so hyped about!

Play today for free the original game! 

Currently in Version 1.1

Development Progress unsure

See beta versions here!

ⒹⒾⓇⒺⒸⓉⒾⓄⓃⓈ

--------------------------------------------------------------- 

USE THE ARROW KEYS/WAD TO MOVE!

---------------------------------------------------------------

                         CHANGELOG & POSSIBLE UPDATES

---------------------------------------------------------------

Version 1.0 - Release of game

Version 1.1 - complete remake by Blacksmith52! Added music by IncredFX and now featuring "Admin Mode" for testing! Robotnik now stays upright and Sanic jump physics have been revised for more "sonicissm."

Leave a comment saying what I should add in the future!

---------------------------------------------------------------

Music by Ī̴̟̳̜̜̦̹͕̱̮͍͆̊̇̀̿̋̅n̵̛̛̲̦̖̲̻̭̄́̓͌͐̋c̷̨̥͈͇͍̦͎̤̀͆̈͌̿̊̏͊̕͜͜ř̨̛̯̤͕̲̘̩̔͆͗̓̃̈́͟e͚̠̠̙̱͓̝͌̈͂̆̓͋d̵̢̛̛͚̩̦̜͈͗̇͆̑͊͐̓̚͜͜F̶͍̥̝̙̰̔̇̑͆̉̈͊̂͞X̴̧̧͕̩͈̠̘̾̑͋͐͑͜ͅͅ

Sprites by B̸͈͎̺̰͕̼̥͖̝̿͗̽̀́͟ỉ̶̢̧͙̮̗̙̲͚̮͌̌͌̄͘͞͡l̵͉̩̖̹͖͉̟͒͌́̍̿͢l̵̡̯̼̭̲̖̂́̋͐̾̀̓ͅe̢͚͍̰̟͇̮̓͑̿͗̀͊͂͆ͅh̶͓̼̙̱̩̹̘̼̝̍̊̀̑̃̍̌͘B̸̧̭͇͖̗̺̐͛͗̔̋͋́͞ǎ̡̢̛̫̭̭̲̤͙̺̓̾̀̆͂͞w̶̨̺̗͕͙͙̺̯̐͂͂̄̂͠͝b̵̖͕̪̼̼͉̈́͐̑͗̓̉ and others

William Roberts, please know that making fun of sonic games is not justified if yours is not good.
